title: Global Hearing Aids Market to Garner USD 12 Billion in 2031 and to Grow with a CAGR of ~ 7% during 2022-2031; Market to Grow on Account of Rising Incidences of Hearing Loss and Increased Levels of Noise Exposure - Kenneth Research
